issue.title: Joint velocities are high when the joint link is in contact and the joint is not rotating

content.raw:
No, the cylinder is a 10kg object in world. I've pushed my world file here

[https://bitbucket.org/jespersmith/gazebostatecommunicator/src/4b84fd75562c009abccd8465fdc8d8edf94c9638/launch/models/hand.world?at=default](https://bitbucket.org/jespersmith/gazebostatecommunicator/src/4b84fd75562c009abccd8465fdc8d8edf94c9638/launch/models/hand.world?at=default)

The hand on box model I use (with the reduced inertias for the hand) is in 

https://bitbucket.org/jespersmith/gazebostatecommunicator/src/4b84fd75562c/launch/models/gazebo_models/sandia_left_hand_on_box?at=default
